author: Jennifer Liu
title: Virtual happy hours, team yoga sessions: How coworkers are staying connected while they work from home
description: For many people, coworkers are their main source of daily human interaction. In the age of coronavirus and social distancing, they've taken to virtual means to stay connected.
content: For many people, coworkers are their main source of daily human interaction. But with the coronavirus disrupting daily life, including by sending millions home to work remotely for the foreseeable future, office workers across the country are having to naviga… [+9078 chars]
